reasons_to_visit.details: Brno's Christmas markets at Zelný trh and Freedom Square feature traditional Moravian crafts, mulled wine, and local specialties.
Snow-covered Špilberk Castle and functionalist Villa Tugendhat create stunning winter photography opportunities.
Festive decorations throughout Brno's historic center and cozy atmosphere in traditional pubs.
December builds to spectacular New Year's Eve fireworks over Špilberk Castle.
Perfect time for Villa Tugendhat winter tours, Technical Museum visits, and Moravian Museum exhibitions.

reasons_to_avoid.details: December temperatures often drop below freezing, requiring heavy winter clothing.
December attracts significant numbers of tourists for Christmas market visits.
Shortest days of the year with very limited sunshine hours.
Christmas and New Year's periods see increased prices for accommodations and dining.

activities: Christmas markets at Zelný trh and Freedom Square
New Year's Eve celebrations with fireworks
Indoor museum visits and cultural events
